alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 17 at 4:31PM CDT until further notice by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Deep South Texas, including the following county, Hidalgo. * WHEN...Until 530 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in Sharyland near Griffin and 2 mile . Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Sharyland near Griffin and 2 mile is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mission, Pharr, San Juan, South McAllen, Sharyland, Mcallen City Hall, Fields Elementary School, Mcallen Police Department, Mcallen Chamber Of Commerce, Archer Park, Rio Grande Regional Hospital, Newport Landing, Hackberry Park, Country Club Terrace, De Palmas Historic District, Mcallen Fire Department, Zavala Elementary School, Chateau Heights, Mcallen Miller International Airport and Airport Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
